title: Academic and Personal Website Creation: A Quarto Tutorial
text:
About Me

I’m an incoming 5th year doctoral candidate 
Experimental Psychology at Ohio University 
My research interests include:

Prejudice and Discrimination
Psych of Religion

Scientific Hobby Interests:

R
Quarto

title: Academic and Personal Website Creation: A Quarto Tutorial
text:
Changing Theme Appearance

The default theme isn’t the only one you can do
By default there are 12 pre-made options

flatly is the default. darkly is the dark-mode version

However, they’re open source and the files can be changed or modified

As long as you know SCSS

I don’t know either one (well), BUT ChatGPT and Google help
I’ll show you a couple things quick

title: Academic and Personal Website Creation: A Quarto Tutorial
text:
Publishing Your Website

PublishingFinal Product



Several options to publish
Personally I think Netlify is the best because you get some choice over your web address (and it’s free1)







Caution


1Netlify will charge you should your site start receiving a lot of traffic. In which case other options might be better depending on how much traffic you expect to generate.








You can find the repo on my GitHub
